name: Open Space Intensifies
description:
Open Space Intensifies

This is a simple game where you have to relief the stress of office workers to improve their productivity.

Authors
  • Pavel Grebnev https://gameraccoon.itch.io/
  • Kirill Mikhel https://agrdev.itch.io/
  • Nick Korotysh https://github.com/Kolcha
Tools
  • Godot
  • Krita
  • Miro
  • art/users
  • art/office-tileset
  • Font is "Xolonium"
  • Sound effects of phone, printer and coffee machine are downloaded from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ and https://freesound.org/
